data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Cross River, Nigeria.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cross River, Nigeria
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Cross River.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: There are 3,104,400 people living in the state of Cross River. Only about 799,768 might be believers.
Jesus, remind the disciples in the state of Cross River to train each other to obey all that you commanded, and that you will be with them as they do it.
data.verse: and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you. And surely I am with you always, to the very end of the age."

data.prayer: Lord, remember the Ukwa people. Make the Ukwa people a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for your own possession.
Jesus, defend your people in the state of Cross River against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Cross River, Nigeria so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Cross River with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.
